attributes.action: make car manufactures to make/test safe cost efficiant carseats
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as a parent of three children all under 5 i find it hard to get 3 ar seats in the back of my car i agree with the new car seat law and to make life for me and others easier so i want the prime minister to get car manufacturers to make carseats especially for cars that are cost efficiant (cheep inother words)
it might sound costly but it will help people like me who ind it hard to fit three car seats in the back especoally with the new rules
